name: Left Vs Right
description:
Setting aside the simplicity of this project, it’s one that I’m pretty proud of. It started as a simple exercise: Write a program that can 

- randomly show a prompt 

- detect left vs right mouse clicking

-  Keep track of a score

- and punish the player by adding time to the timer for every wrong click. 

Simple enough right? Well, for someone who is not that good at programing yet, this was a pretty tough puzzle, but with some guidance and a lot of staring at my code, I figured it out and it works! 

Music by me. 

Computer asset by kreems

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/macintosh-128k-896ea439b67b4606a23fb8b93be6af6d
